nodes.text: Selwyn Eddy, sometimes credited as Selwyn Eddy III, was a computer graphics artist for the special edition of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, assistant cameraman for Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and a miniature and optical effects cameraman for Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. He was also the effects cameraman for the original Star Tours (in which he appears) and has worked on Indiana Jones and Star Trek.
